bibl.author: A. J. Falls
bibl.title: A. J. Falls to H. B. Anthony, 22 February 1871

revisionDesc.change: added bibliographic data with microcopy and roll numbers

body.note: a copy of Mr. Coggeshall's recommendations
body.ab:
I am directed by the Attorney General to enclose herewith a copy of the recommendation of the members of the bar of Rhode Island for the appointment of James
H. Coggeshall as Marshal of the United States for that District.
